akn:section.akn:heading: Special pay: psychologists and nonphysician health care providers

akn:content.akn:p: (a) A member who is— is entitled to special pay, as provided in subsection (b).
(b) The rate of special pay to which an officer is entitled pursuant to subsection (a) shall be—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Army, Navy, and Air Force Psychologists.—

akn:content.akn:p: (c) The Secretary of Defense may provide special pay at the rates specified in subsection (b) to an officer who—
